alert.note: Alert for Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 22 at 6:03AM CDT until October 23 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Critical Wildfire Conditions Expected Sunday... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 066... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Sunday morning through Sunday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 066 Stafford. * WIND...Sustained southwest winds of 30-40 mph with wind gusts up to 60 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 15%. * HIGHEST THREAT...is located for areas along and west of highway 283. These areas will have the strongest winds and lowest humidity values during the afternoon. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
